## Database Connector
[Database Connnector 공식 github](https://github.com/ohdsi/databaseconnector)

- Database Connnector 2.4 version에서 지원하는 DB는 다음과 같다
  - MicrosoftSQL Server
  - Oracle
  - PostgresSql
  - Microsoft Parallel Data Warehouse (a.k.a. Analytics Platform System)
  - Amazon Redshift
  - Apache Impala
  - Google BigQuery
  - IBM Netezza
  - SQLite
